Unicron/Vehement/Sun Crusher/Reflector:




Unicron lowered his arms, inspecting his handiwork.  He'd gave more power to 
stronger beings than his current servants, but he wasn't nearly as powerful 
as he had been.  For now.  /ARISE MY DARK WARRIORS.  LET MY GIFT AID YOU ON 
YOUR CELESTIAL PATH/

There was still a slight pain from the ancient being speaking, though not 
nearly as much.  Vehement stepped forward, looking pretty much the same 
except for a large black cannon attached to his right arm.

"Mighty Unicron, what do you require of us?  We are yours to command from now 
to eternity."

/WE MUST MAKE A TEST OF YOUR NEW ABILITIES/

Gathering enough of courage that had never been in him as far as Reflector 
could remember, he stepped forward.  The Brotherhood member waited for a 
silent second, and spoke.  "Chaos-Bringer, may I suggest an attack of some 
sort?"

/OF COURSE/

"A strike against an already wounded enemy to keep risk away?"

/YES.  NOW GO/ As soon ast he booming voice had spoke the three upgraded 
Brotherhood members took flight back the way they had came.
